org.parboiled
Interface ContextAware<V>

Type Parameters:
V - the type of the value field of a parse tree node
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAction, BaseActions, BaseParser
public interface ContextAware<V>

Interface that can be implemented by classes containing action methods. If the class containing action methods implements this interface parboiled will use it to inform the instance of the current context, immediately before an action call.

Method Summary
 void setContext(Context<V> context)
          Called immediately before any parser action method invocation.
 

Method Detail

setContext

void setContext(@NotNull
                Context<V> context)
Called immediately before any parser action method invocation. Informs the object containing the action about the context to be used for the coming action call.

Parameters:
context - the context
